resources.string: To create a new countdown, tap the edit button in the bottom right from the homescreen.

When editing your countdown you can set a name, this will show on the mainscreen to allow you to indetify your countdown. 
 
You can either select a local date or pick a public holiday provided by Gov.UK. 
 
Pressing save will return you back to the countdown view.
Selecting \'Local Date Selection\' will allow you to select a date, doing this will start a countdown from a the currentdate to your chosen date.
